mapper.select: SELECT m.mapping_id as presetId, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY m.mapping_id) as orderIndex, m.mapping_name as title, m.is_active as isRepresentative, COUNT(mi.mapping_item_id) AS gestureCount FROM mappings m LEFT JOIN mapping_items mi ON mi.mapping_id = m.mapping_id WHERE m.account_id = #{accountId} GROUP BY m.mapping_id, m.mapping_name, m.is_active ORDER BY m.mapping_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mappings (account_id, mapping_name, is_active, change_type, note, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{account.id}, #{name}, #{isActive}, #{changeType}, #{note}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE mappings SET is_active = false WHERE account_id = #{accountId}
mapper.select: SELECT mapping_id, account_id, mapping_name, is_active, change_type, note, created_at, updated_at FROM mappings WHERE account_id = #{accountId} AND is_active = true
